title: Bulletin of the History of Medicine

contents.note: JSTOR (full text also available for subscription or payment)

preceded-by.note: Bulletin of the Institute of the History of Medicine

additional-note: While we found no renewals filed for the Bulletin itself, some Supplements to the Bulletin do have renewed and active copyrights, starting from the first one, 'The Hippocratic Oath' by Ludwig Edelstein, published and copyrighted in 1943, with copyright renewed in 1971. Before concluding any supplements are public domain, search for renewals under their distinctive titles.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
